[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Hero Section” _builder_version=”4.26.0″ use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_direction=”116deg” background_color_gradient_stops=”#282723 0%|rgba(0,0,0,0) 74%” background_color_gradient_overlays_image=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”#282723″ background_color_gradient_end=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” background_color_gradient_end_position=”74%” background_image=”https://sharonblackie.net/wp-content/uploads/Screenshot-2024-05-02-at-14.24.04-1.png” custom_padding=”10%||10%||false|false” hover_enabled=”0″ saved_tabs=”all” global_colors_info=”{}” title_text=”Screenshot 2024-05-02 at 14.24.04″ sticky_enabled=”0″][et_pb_row admin_label=”Hero Area” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”46px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Title” _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”||||||||” header_font=”|||on|||||” header_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_font_size=”79px” header_line_height=”1.2em” header_2_font=”||||||||” header_2_text_color=”#6b0906″ header_2_font_size=”74px” background_layout=”dark” animation_style=”fade” header_font_size_tablet=”” header_font_size_phone=”40px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

a psyche the size of earth

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_text_color=”#282723″ header_text_color=”#d9c2a3″ header_2_text_color=”#282723″ header_2_font_size=”33px” header_2_line_height=”1.3em” header_3_text_color=”#d9c2a3″ header_4_text_color=”#d9c2a3″ header_2_font_size_tablet=”29px” header_2_font_size_phone=”24px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

An online gathering in the Bone Cave

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#282723″ min_height=”340px” custom_margin=”||-30px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ text_line_height=”1.5em” header_font=”||||||||” header_2_text_align=”center” header_2_text_color=”#d9c2a3″ header_2_line_height=”1.3em” header_3_font=”||||||||” header_3_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_4_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” text_font_size_tablet=”22px” text_font_size_phone=”” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|tablet” z_index_tablet=”500″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

Saturday September 18, 2021

14.30 – 19.00 UK time

Purchase the recording of this event

 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#282723″ custom_padding=”2px|||||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_padding=”24px|||||” custom_padding_tablet=”0px||||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”Raleway|300||on|||||” header_2_text_color=”#fed593″ header_2_font_size=”30px” header_2_line_height=”1.3em” global_colors_info=”{}”]

An online gathering to explore our connection to place

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#ffffff” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” z_index_tablet=”500″ text_text_align=”left” global_colors_info=”{}”]

As our crumbling social, political and religious institutions continue to fail us, and as we watch the consequences of our own actions choke the planet, more and more people are looking elsewhere for answers to the ever-more urgent question of how we should live now. Looking to the wisdom which all the old stories tell us can be found on the fringes, in the forest, in the wild thickets of the ancient hedge. In our own native European wisdom and mystery traditions – the rich ancestral lineage which so few are aware that we possess. It’s time to reclaim those traditions, and weave them into an authentic, grounded practice for very different times.

The roots of our ancient traditions are anchored in the land, and the land is our greatest teacher. In this workshop, we’ll work with the ways in which we can court and embed ourselves in the psyche of this beautiful animate earth. We’ll explore these questions:

 

  • How can we put our roots down deeply into this ancient earth, and find our sense of the sacred there again?
  • How can we find the gods in our places again?
  • How can we engage in conversation with the other-than-humans in our places? – compose a riddle for Trickster Crow, dance with the west wind, serenade the waxing moon?
  • How do we live in a spirit of ceremony, and work intentionally, to deepen our encounters with the mystery which penetrates the world around us?

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”Raleway|300||on|||||” header_2_text_color=”#fed593″ header_2_font_size=”30px” header_2_line_height=”1.3em” custom_margin=”||-2px|||” custom_padding=”33px||0px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

how it works

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#ffffff” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_padding=”20px||” z_index_tablet=”500″ text_text_align=”left” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Our gathering took place via Zoom, in a format which enabled us to enjoy each other’s faces, and to break out into discussion groups to deepen our connections with other participants. As well as the usual blend of story, poetry and discussion, Heather Munro Pierce, founder of the Women’s BodyMystik Dance Tribe, led us in a session of embodied wisdom through dance.

The recording of this event is available for purchase; it includes a video of the main session, the chat transcript, and access to downloadable resources; we did not record the breakout sessions. The full recording is approximately 3 hours and 15 minutes long.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#847873″ custom_padding=”||36px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”4.16″ min_height=”326px” custom_padding=”4px||0px|||” custom_padding_tablet=”30px||||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”10px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”Raleway|300||on|||||” header_2_text_color=”#fed593″ header_2_font_size=”30px” header_2_line_height=”1.3em” custom_padding=”22px||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

How TO JOIN

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#ffffff” header_font=”||||||||” header_3_font=”Raleway|300|||||||” header_3_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_3_font_size=”28px” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_margin=”||-140px|||” z_index_tablet=”500″ text_text_align=”left” global_colors_info=”{}”]

The fee for accessing the recording is £25. Please follow the link below to make your payment using any credit or debit card. (For those of you in other countries: currency exchange rates change by the hour, and so we’re not able to tell you what the cost of this course is in your currency. This currency converter offers you live rates, though they may or may not reflect the rates actually given to you by your bank or credit card provider. It will, however, give you an indication.)

IMPORTANT: While paying and registering, you will be asked to create a username and password which will allow you to log into the Members’ Area of this website, visit the event ‘Welcome’ page, and so access the recording and resources for this gathering. It’s important that you make a note of these details; you won’t be able to view the recording if you do not have them.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_code _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

Price:

[/et_pb_code][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ custom_padding=”25px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

*  Please agree to the workshop Terms & Conditions to continue

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

Please note in particular, before purchasing, that no refunds can be given for this event.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Workshops and Events Section” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”0px||0px|” saved_tabs=”all” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”0″ make_equal=”on” admin_label=”About Area” _builder_version=”4.17.4″ background_color=”#44393d” width=”100%” max_width=”100%” custom_margin=”0px||0px” custom_padding=”0px||0px|” use_custom_width=”on” width_unit=”off” custom_width_percent=”100%” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_enable_color=”off” background_image=”https://sharonblackie.net/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/wolves-left-OPT.jpg” custom_padding=”7%|5%|7%|5%|true|false” custom_padding_tablet=”33%||33%||true|false” custom_padding_phone=”” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.17.4″ background_color=”#44393d” background_enable_image=”off” custom_padding=”5%|5%|5%|5%|true” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ header_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_2_font=”|300||on|||||” header_2_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_2_font_size=”34px” custom_padding_tablet=”10px||||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

JOIN MY PACK

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#c34d49″ divider_weight=”2px” _builder_version=”4.16″ width=”50px” custom_padding=”20px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.17.4″ text_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_2_font=”|300||on|||||” header_2_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_2_font_size=”34px” custom_margin=”||41px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Subscribe to my free monthly newsletter on Substack, and be among the first to hear all the latest news about my books, courses and events – as well as personal seasonal reflections and reading recommendations. You’ll also receive signed book and course giveaways that are exclusively for subscribers, and a special gift as a thank you for joining me!

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”https://sharonblackie.substack.com” url_new_window=”on” button_text=”JOIN MY LIST” _builder_version=”4.17.4″ custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”18px” button_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ button_bg_color=”#c34d49″ button_border_width=”4px” button_border_color=”#c34d49″ button_border_radius=”100px” button_font=”|300||on|||||” button_use_icon=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
